casebody.data:
THE LOANERS BANK, Plaintiff and Respondent, v. SAMUEL G. REED, Defendant and Appellant.

Before Freedman and Curtis, JJ.

Decided November 2, 1872. Appeal from a judgment in favor of plaintiff in an action to recover the amount of a promissory note. Wm. D. Booth, for appellant. Sewell & Pierce, for respondents. Judgment affirmed.

Opinion by Curtis, J., concurred in by Freedman, J.
